snippet.title: GravitX The Gravytoid - Trailer
snippet.description:
Action-Platform, Metroidvania, Adventure and Puzzle game. 

🔗 Game link:
• Web (Android, iOS, Xbox, PlayStation, Steam Deck, PC) 
https://is-daouda.github.io/gxtg

• Android (Google Play) 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.isdaouda.gravytxthegravytoid

• PC (Windows, Linux, macOS) 
https://is-daouda.itch.io/gravytx-the-gravytoid

• Link of the C++ game engine that served to create the game:
https://github.com/Is-Daouda/is-Engine
